about contact explanation:
CGWire
84 avenue de la République
75011 Paris
about blender information: All production images shown in screenshots were created by Blender Studio during the production of Sprite Fright. They are licensed under Creative Commons.
about design information: All artworks are created by the Naolito Studio and Ev Style. They are licensed under Creative Commons by-nc-sa.
about explanation one: As production complexity increased and deadlines tightened, the need for efficient teamwork became more crucial. The growing amount of data to manage made it harder to deliver high-quality movies, often keeping people late at night. That's why we decided to put an end to this. We wake up every morning with one goal: to help you deliver high-end visuals while keeping the process enjoyable.
about explanation three: Through our solutions, artists can collaborate effortlessly with teams and can focus on their craft, developing their skills and reaching new heights. Meanwhile, studios can scale seamlessly, unleashing their potential and fulfilling their ambitions.
about explanation two: To achieve this, we reimagined communication both inside and outside the studio. Internally, we transformed the production tracker into a collaborative platform where all stakeholders can share information in real time and become more autonomous. Externally, we enabled talents from different studios to connect and grow their skills together.
about legal explanation:
CGWire
84 avenue de la République
75011 Paris
about partners title: Find out who works with us
about privacy one: This Policy describes the information we collect from you, how we use that information, and our legal basis for doing so. It also covers whether and how that information may be shared and your rights and choices regarding the information you provide to us.
about team explanation elsa: Elsa has worked for 15 years in the movie industry as a Chief Financial Officer in studios and organizations promoting cinema. She is responsible for the financial aspects at CGWire.
about team explanation evan: Evan is an experienced Python Software Engineer involved in open-source projects. At CGWire, he maintains and improves the Kitsu API and DCC integrations.
about team explanation frank: Before CGWire, Frank worked for studios and co-founded a startup. He has 15 years of experience in tech companies. Today, he nurtures the CGWire and Kitsu brands and gathers the right people to build them.
about team explanation gwen: Gwenaëlle has over 10 years of experience as a production manager with distributed teams. At CGWire, she handles all product management and sales aspects, ensuring the success of every Kitsu implementation.
about team explanation nicolas: Nicolas is one of the most renowned French System Administrators and a speaker at many tech events. He manages our cloud and on-premise infrastructures, ensuring your Kitsu instance is always up and running.
about team explanation nicolaspennec: Nicolas is an experienced JavaScript developer with 15 years of experience at companies such as OVH and Orange. He frequently speaks at conferences about frontend technologies and is in charge of all Kitsu UIs.
about team intro: We are a passionate team based in France with extensive experience in software development, production management, and product development.
about terms one: By using the CGWire Hosting provided by CGWire, you are agreeing to be bound by the following terms and conditions.
about values text one: The lighter our tools, the more agile we become. It clears our minds and speeds everything up.
about values text three: Well-made things last longer. When they are a joy to work on, it leads to better software.
about values text two: When ideas and work are shared, everyone wins. We learn faster and achieve more.
about work text one: We share most of what we build and learn. We have also made our KPIs public.
about work text three: We always need to learn. That's why we dedicate one day a week to self-training.
about work text two: We work from where we want when we want. Only productivity matters.
api quote: The Python client for Kitsu is incredibly useful for a TD. I was able to quickly code custom tools for production and leads. Thank you for keeping Kitsu open to other software!
api quote author: Jérôme Brack, Technical Director at DogHouse Films
casting-management asset-links content: Connect assets for specific representation. Populate sets, link props to characters, or anything fitting your workflow.
casting-management export content: Export all casting information as a flat .csv file or a column representation. Connect your tools to our API to enhance your scene builder.
casting-management header explanation: Create breakdowns and access casting information from anywhere. Add as many asset occurrences as needed and record relevant metadata. This way, you'll know when your shots are ready to be built.
casting-management header metrics: More than 200 000 assets have been managed with Kitsu!
casting-management tables content: Build breakdown tables showing the casted assets for each shot, organized by type. Add metadata directly to every shot, providing information for your scene builder.
community_explanation_one: As we progressed in building CGWire, we increasingly felt the need to enhance collaboration between studios. That's why we have fostered both online and offline communities of animation professionals. Topics extend beyond just Kitsu. TDs and production managers share tips and best practices to tackle their day-to-day challenges. Below, you'll find the platform we use to connect with our community.
community feedback explanation: Post feedback and comments. Vote for existing feature requests. See what is under development and help shape the future of Kitsu with the community.
community forum explanation: Discuss various topics about CG or simply ask us for assistance with one of our products. Post on the forum to ask your question.
community github explanation: Post bug reports or feature requests on our GitHub repositories. See how we code, participate in architecture discussions, and even better, send your pull requests!
community meetup explanation: We organize meetups with industry professionals to discuss production management, pipeline, and artistic techniques. Come and listen to talks from your peers!
community slack explanation: Join our Discord channel. Industry professionals share and exchange best practices and ideas about pipeline and software development!
community translate explanation: Kitsu is already available in 6 languages. With your help, we can go further. Translate Kitsu in your language and allow more people to access our open-source technologies.
comparison ftrack subtitle: When to use Kitsu and Ftrack
comparison shotgrid subtitle: When to use Kitsu and Autodesk Flow
comparison selfhosted subtitle: When to subscribe to our cloud offer
contact explanation one: Find all our contact emails for support, sales, or partnership inquiries.
elite-hosting availability content: We closely monitor all activity on your instance and receive alerts for any suspicious or problematic events. This enables us to resolve issues as quickly as possible.
elite-hosting availability title: Ensure your Kitsu instance is always up
elite-hosting header explanation: Our operation team provides you with the highest standards of the cloud industry. With decades of experience, we ensure that your installation is always up and that your data are always secured. All our installations are safely isolated ensuring performance and confidentiality.
elite-hosting header subtitle: Your data is always available and secure
elite-hosting performance content: Your installation is isolated from others and is set up near your location. All videos processing is run on a dedicated machine, allowing you to build large playlists.
elite-hosting performance title: Ensure fast access to production data
elite-hosting security content: We adhere to the highest security standards, using only secure transmissions for accessing our up-to-date installations. All secrets are managed through secure vaults, and our employees are screened. A security document is available upon request.
feature-films people desc 1-1: Artists need quick and easy access to their tasks and a simple way to communicate about their work by posting comments and previews.
feature-films people desc 1-2: When an artist logs in, they can access their to-do list. At a glance, they can see all relevant information about what needs to be done.
feature-films people desc 1-3: All tasks contain detailed metadata, such as due dates, time estimates, priority level, current status, and comment history.
feature-films people desc 1-4: With a single click, the artist opens a comment panel without leaving their to-do list. It's super fast to respond or send a new preview. Through the notification system (in-app, email, or Slack), they know when something happens.
feature-films people desc 2-1: Directors need an efficient way to review pending tasks and stay aware of production progress. This enables them to react quickly and prevent the team from wasting time due to missed feedback.
feature-films people desc 2-2: With Kitsu's playlist system, the Director can review multiple shots from anywhere, whether it's a few pending reviews or the entire movie. Kitsu includes editing functions like changing the shot order or switching versions on the fly, allowing the Director to be more precise about what they want to see.
feature-films people desc 3-1: As a Production Manager, tracking production costs and knowing the status of reviews and retakes is essential.
feature-films people desc 3-2: Kitsu provides efficient timesheets where you can see the number of hours spent by each artist, per day, per week, or per month for all productions.
feature-films people desc 3-3: For each shot or asset, you can see the overall time spent on it, helping to identify entities that cost too much. You can set estimates for every task and compare them to the time spent.
feature-films people desc 3-4: With the statistics page, you can create efficient production reports. No need to chase down information; it shows you the production progress in real-time.
feature-films people desc 3-5: You don't need to spend time gathering files for the daily or weekly review. With the playlist page, you can create reviews quickly without missing anything.
feature-films people desc 4-1: The producer has a comprehensive view of the production. They can verify any information from the client or the contractor.
feature-films people desc 4-2: Kitsu provides financial insights into the production. It shows where money is being spent and why. The producer can identify which shots or assets are the most costly, and use charts to always provide an up-to-date overview of the production's progress.
feature-films people desc 4-3: The producer can independently monitor the progress of the show. No one needs to pause their work to provide pictures or previews. They can view the progress of an episode in real-time.
feature-films people desc 5-1: Supervisors need instant access to information at all times. They don't want to spend time searching for the right spreadsheet or file to comment on.
feature-films people desc 5-2: Fortunately, with Kitsu, everything is in one place. Supervisors don't have to wait for others to know what to do. They always know what to review and which retakes need to be done.
feature-films people desc 5-3: Task assignments, mentions, and comments ensure that information is efficiently sent to the right person. Supervisors have everything at hand to make the right decision.
feature-films quote: Kitsu has pretty much unified everything and is forcing neater communication.
feature-films quote author: Pete Draper, Head of VFX at Makuta VFX (RRR movie)
feature-films reasons item 1: Get an overview of the progress of all your sequences
feature-films reasons item 2: Run full sequence reviews through a single playlist with external collaborators
feature-films reasons title: Why you should use Kitsu for your Feature Film Production
gazu explanation one: With the Kitsu Python client, it is very easy to query the Kitsu API. We designed a Python client that is simple to understand and get started with. Write your code as if you were writing plain text and enjoy adding value to your DCC tools.
gazu features four: Available as a Python package on PyPi.org.
gazu features one: Intuitive functions to fetch production data.
gazu features three: Cache system for faster response time.
gazu features two: Raw client to handle more complex requests.
gazu tagline: With Kitsu's Python Client, enhance your DCC tools with your production data
gazu title: With our Python Client, enhance your DCC tools with your production data
gazu usecase one: Displaying an artist's tasks and files directly in their DCC solution has never been easier. Simply include the Kitsu Python Client in your app, and relax as your tools and plugins access your production data in seconds.
gazu why one: Quickly and easily access details about a given entity. Run full-text queries on your database to quickly find assets or persons. Users don't need to look through lists or remember complex names. The first letters of the entity name are enough.

header text community: Places to contribute and meet other users
header text customer-stories: Learn about our users success stories
header text elite-hosting: Robust security, high uptime, and automatic updates
header text feature-films: Keep your vendors aligned for high-quality results
header text kitsu: Connect your data, stay informed, and ship faster
header text production-tracker: Schedule projects, track progress and build production reports
header text review-engine: Collect previews and run collaborative feedback sessions
header text software-integrations: Bridge your production data with your main tools.
header text studio-database: Integrate production data directly into your pipeline
header text tailor-made-architecture: Multi-instances, authentication integrations, and object storage
header text team-collaboration: Assign tasks, share statuses and communicate with artists
header text top-notch-support: Expert user support from industry professionals
header text tutorials: Short videos to help you use Kitsu
header text tvshows: Managing the demands of TV series production
integrations subtitle chats: Keep your team up to date
integrations subtitle software: Access Kitsu data in your tools
integrations title chats: Push notifications to your chat applications
integrations title dcc: Publish from your Favorite Digital Content Creation Tools
integrations title software: Integrate Kitsu directly into Your Code
kitsu description: Kitsu is a collaboration platform for animation and VFX studios. It empowers your teams to deliver higher-quality content more efficiently.
kitsu modules subtitle: Designed with production use cases in mind
kitsu modules title: Five modules as pillars of your productions
kitsu modules description: Kitsu offers five modules designed to help you manage your productions efficiently. They are the result of continuous iterations with hundreds of studios.
kitsu scale api-text: Integrate production data into your pipeline.
kitsu scale reports-text: Have a 360° view on your productions and stay in control.
kitsu scale stories-text: Discover how studios have used our products to enhance collaboration and successfully complete productions.
kitsu scale todos-text: Empower your artists with efficient to-do lists.
kitsu scale reviews-text: Conduct reviews for each delivery and compare different versions.
kitsu services title: Robust services to support your production
kitsu services description: A production database thrives with the right support. Our industry-experienced support team is always there for you, ensuring everything runs smoothly and securely.
kitsu stories description: See how our customers implemented Kitsu in their studios for any kind of productions: Shorts, TV, series, feature films, 2D, 3D or VFX.
main conclusion tagline: Harnessing our technical expertise to empower your creativity
main conclusion text: CGWire's software is open source and developed in collaboration with studios. All features and functionality have been validated through real-life use cases.
main contact introduction: Want to try CGWire product suite? We offer a 1-month trial!
main cookies consent: Do you allow us to set cookies to build anonymous visitor analytics and allow you to contact our support?
main customer story adm: We needed a tool to link tasks and visual deliveries. We wanted practical and pleasant software for the teams. Especially for Filmmakers, who had to access the shots end-to-end at any moment. And of course, all while allowing production managers to track the progress with ease.
main customer story fost: With Kitsu, people think first about the time saved but what matters more to me is the serenity you get by having everything in order. It gave you more space in your brain to focus on other elements of your production.
main customer story makuta: Kitsu has pretty much unified everything and is forcing neater communication not only between artists but from production, management, and clients.
main customer story miyu: A few days are enough to understand all the features required to run a production. Everyone in the studio starts quickly, especially artists who really enjoy Kitsu. We didn't notice this enthusiasm with the previous tools we used.
main explanation one: With Kitsu, you can enable efficient collaboration between distributed teams, whether in the studio or from home. This results in better decision-making and faster deliveries.
main explanation text four: Kitsu saves time and increases efficiency. Once integrated into your pipeline, it supercharges your studio, making it easier than ever to acquire more productions!
main explanation text one: Receive up-to-date information on your production's progress, allowing you to assign tasks and provide efficient feedback, keeping your team on track.
main explanation text three: Streamlined and intuitive software is quicker to use and easier to get started with. With Kitsu, you can start your projects without the need for a consultant or intensive training.
main explanation text two: Your content is stored securely and will always be accessible to your team and throughout your pipeline. Everyone knows what to do, whether in the studio or from home.
main explanation trusted: Trusted by studios and schools all over the world
main explanation two: CGWire understands these problems well. We have extensive experience in studios and as software engineers. The good news: we can help you!
main newsletter title: To follow our progress, subscribe to our newsletter:
main services intro: To assist you we offer the following services:
main services one: We propose our open source tools to manage your productions and your files efficiently.
main services three: We provide hosting services if you prefer not to manage IT infrastructure while using CGWire's products.
main services two: We develop features and tools around our open source solutions to automate your recurring tasks.
main solutions api: An API to store and manage your production data.
main solutions client: A Python client to connect your tools to the Kitsu API.
main solutions frontend: A web app for your production management.
main solutions introduction: To assist you in your pipeline setup, we are developing open-source tools to make your life easier:
main solutions title: Discover our free and open source solutions
main subtitle: CGWire develops Kitsu, a platform for animation and VFX productions that brings teams and tools together in a single place. Collaborate, manage deliveries, and perform reviews from anywhere.
main tagline: Elevate Your Productions To The Next Level
newsletter description: Get the latest news about CGWire and Kitsu, the collaboration platform for Animation studios.
pricing cloud explanation: We provide an adaptated cloud installation with user support and additional features.
pricing contact explanation: We can adapt our offer to your specific needs and propose professional services
pricing discount details: All plans come with a 1-month trial
pricing faq answer1: We accept credit cards only for monthly payments. For yearly subscriptions, you can pay via credit card, wire transfer or with a SEPA payment.
pricing faq answer10: Monthly subscriptions can be canceled through your account page. For yearly subscription please contact our team, and we will set the cancelation in our billing system.
pricing faq answer11: Yes, we can provide tailor-made plans that fit your production.
pricing faq answer2: All the API features are included in your subscription: REST routes, event stream, and full-text search.
pricing faq answer3: Every feature is included in the free trial with unlimited user access. But Kitsu will run on low-end hardware. To try it with stronger hardware please contact our team.
pricing faq answer4: It corresponds to your installation of Kitsu. It runs on its own domain name (yourstudio.cg-wire.com). You will have a different account on it and your team will interact with this installation.
pricing faq answer5: Yes, this is what we name On-Premise hosting. We manage Kitsu on your server like if it was on the cloud.
pricing faq answer6: We set the disk limitation to make sure you don't feel constrained by. If you have a very intensive load of previews please contact us to estimate extra costs. As a rule of thumb, a 50x11' TV series will require 200GB.
pricing faq answer7: You can change it at any time. You will pay the remaining period at pro-rata rates. If you downgrade, your subscription a credit note will be submitted for future renewals.
pricing faq answer8: If you run a monthly subscription, you can change it directly through your account page. For yearly subscriptions, you have to contact our sales team. We will operate the change in our billing system.
pricing faq answer9: A yearly subscription means that you pay for 12 months upfront. By showing your commitment, you benefit from a 20% discount compared to the monthly rate.
pricing faq question1: What forms of payment do you accept?
pricing faq question10: How do I cancel my subscription?
pricing faq question11: My production will run on X months. Can you provide a subscription for this?
pricing faq question2: Do I have access to the API with my subscription?
pricing faq question3: What is included in the free trial?
pricing faq question5: Can I make Kitsu run on my servers?
pricing faq question6: Is the disk space provided enough for my needs?
pricing faq question7: Can I change my subscription once it has started?
pricing faq question8: How do I change my subscription?
pricing firsteps cta1: Book a meeting or a demo
pricing firsteps question1: Schedule a meeting with a member of our team. Together, we'll explore how Kitsu can improve your workflow and empower your business.
pricing firsteps question2: Then join our Discord community to get in touch with other users and talk about pipelines and workflows.
pricing firsteps question3: Register to access your Kitsu Cloud installation free for 1 month. All features are included, allowing you to test it's full potential.
pricing metadata: See how we can help you to migrate to Kitsu and discover our hosting plans (cloud or on-premise).
pricing opensource details: Kitsu is free and open-source, allowing your team to freely use and modify it on your infrastructure.
pricing ranch explanation: Our subscriptions come with free credits from our partner Ranch Computing! Contact us for details.
pricing school details: We offer a unique price of 3999€ a year for Artist Schools (up to 100 students).
pricing tagline: The right plan for your studio
pricing sucesspack explanation: Our team will help you to define and run a tailor-made implementation of Kitsu into your studio.
pricing sucesspack subtitle: Drive a successful implementation with our help
pricing support license details: We can install Kitsu on your servers, handling setup, upgrades, backups, and monitoring. You receive the same level of support as with the cloud version.
pricing support license ldap: Sync users and passwords from an LDAP directory
pricing support license migation onpremi: Retrieve productions from a Kitsu local instance
pricing support license migration cloud: Retrieve productions from a Kitsu cloud instance
pricing support license subtitle: A full offer on your servers
pricing kitsulight explaination: A Kitsu installation including all the main features, hosted on our servers with community support.
production-tracker header explanation: With Kitsu, schedule each task, track time spent, and set quotas. Use indicators to anticipate problems and build clear production reports. Always have an overview of your production, both at a high and granular level.
production-tracker header metrics: Over 1,000 productions have already been tracked with Kitsu!
production-tracker header subtitle: Stay in control and anticipate problems
production-tracker quotas content: Monitor the productivity of your artists and ensure that no one is blocked. Set productivity goals and ensure quotas are met.
production-tracker report content: With Kitsu, you can view statistics on your projects progress. It provides high-level reports for a quick overview of what is happening. Exports are available for sending reports to third parties.
production-tracker report title: Gain a 360° view of your data
production-tracker schedule content: In the schedule module, you can set the main duration and milestones of your project. This allows you to see resource allocation and plan your production more effectively.
review-engine compare content: Compare any preview with an earlier or related version. View them side by side or as a stacked overlay.
review-engine header explanation: Create playlists to review your shots and assets consecutively, for yourself or your client. Set up review sessions to provide feedback efficiently. Maintain access to all preview versions to compare with earlier deliveries.
review-engine header metrics: Over 2 000 000 videos were already reviewed with Kitsu!
review-engine playlists content: Quickly build review playlists and comment on all shots consecutively. You can add comments and annotations directly from the playlist. Share playlists with your clients or review them with your team.
review-engine room content: Review playlists in sync with your team, allowing everyone to view the same footage and stay on the same page.
schools people desc 1-1: Students need a central place to collaborate with each other and their teachers. Kitsu provides a dedicated workspace for sharing information.
schools people desc 1-2: Kitsu provides a framework for students to organize and receive feedback from their teachers. Thanks to the notification system (in-app, email, or Slack), they are always informed about any required changes.
schools people desc 1-3: Your students will learn how to use a production tracker utilized in real studios. They will gain an early understanding of prioritization and the basics of professional communication.
schools people desc 2-1: Academic Directors can monitor final student projects, easily understand how assignments are progressing, and quickly identify issues.
schools people desc 2-2: Academic Directors can quickly determine the status of a project and evaluate the appropriateness of task assignments. Through the schedules, they will have a comprehensive overview of the major milestones of the project.
schools people desc 3-1: Teachers can stay focused on their areas of expertise. They won't miss any requests for feedback or new previews. They will also be able to identify which student groups require assistance.
schools people desc 3-2: Movie reviews are seamless thanks to the playlist module, which allows comparing different versions at different stages of production.
schools people desc 3-3: Kitsu serves as a dedicated place to store the entire project history, capturing how decisions were made.
schools quote: Kitsu is the exact solution we were looking for to manage our students projects.
schools quote author: Carlos de Carvalho, Director of studies at Pôle 3D
schools reasons item 1: Preparing students for industry-standard production management
schools reasons item 2: Playlist makes reviews easy for teachers
schools reasons item 3: Efficient student interactions with built-in comment system
schools reasons title: Why you should use Kitsu for your Education Program
shorts people desc 1-1: Supervisors work on multiple productions simultaneously. They need to act quickly and stay up to date.
shorts people desc 1-2: Thanks to its real-time capabilities, Kitsu always displays the latest data. Additionally, dashboards and task lists emphasize the most important information.
shorts people desc 1-3: Supervisors can save their most-used filters, making it easy for them to find their retakes or pending reviews.
shorts people desc 1-4: Task assignments, mentions, and comments ensure that information is always sent to the right person, giving supervisors everything they need to make informed decisions.
shorts people desc 2-1: Artists need quick access to their tasks and a simple way to communicate about their work by posting comments and previews.
shorts people desc 2-2: When artists log in, they land on their to-do list. At a glance, they see which tasks to work on. Related data is displayed: entity, task type, estimation, due date, and the most recent comment.
shorts people desc 2-3: All tasks are properly detailed: estimated time, priority level, current status, and the latest comment. Artists can sort this list by priority, status, or last comment.
shorts people desc 2-4: With one click, artists can open a comment panel without leaving their to-do list and write their response, making it easy to reply or send a new preview. Additionally, a notification system informs them of any changes to their account.
shorts people desc 3-1: Directors need an efficient way to review pending tasks and stay informed about production progress. This allows them to react quickly and prevent the team from wasting time due to incorrect directions.
shorts people desc 3-2: To achieve this, Kitsu provides a playlist system, allowing the Director to review multiple shots consecutively. This can include pending reviews or the entire movie. Kitsu also offers editing functions such as changing the shot order or switching versions on the fly. This enables the Director to be more precise about what they want to see.
shorts people desc 3-3: The Director can monitor activities via the news feed, allowing for quick reactions when something goes wrong. There is no need to wait until the end of the week to respond.
shorts people desc 4-1: As a Production Manager, you need to track production costs and know what has been reviewed and how many times it required a retake.
shorts people desc 4-2: Kitsu provides efficient timesheets where you can see the number of hours spent per artist over a day, week, or month. You can access the details by production.
shorts people desc 4-3: For each shot or asset, you can see the overall time spent on it. This helps identify entities that are too costly. You can set estimates for each task and compare them to the actual time spent.
shorts people desc 4-4: The statistics page allows you to write your producer report faster. You don’t have to chase down information. You can simply report the data and track the progress of the project throughout its lifetime.
shorts people desc 4-5: You don't need to spend time gathering files for daily or weekly reviews. With the playlist page, you can set up reviews with a single click and ensure nothing is missed.
shorts people desc 5-1: The producer has greater visibility into the production. They can quickly verify any information from the client or contractor, having all production details at a glance.
shorts people desc 5-2: Kitsu allows the producer to see the financial status of the production, including where money is spent and why. They can identify the most costly shots or assets and adjust quotes for future projects. With the charts, they always know how the production is progressing.
shorts people desc 5-3: The producer doesn't depend on others to see the progress of the show. No one has to stop working to provide pictures or previews. The producer can independently view the progress of an episode or movie.
shorts quote: Kitsu is a very artist-friendly tool for planning and tracking your project. The UI is clean and easy to understand. We received a lot of positive feedback from the team.
shorts quote author: Christian Zehetmeier, Head of Production at Woodblock
shorts reasons item 1: Communicate easily with your Artists and keep the history
shorts reasons item 2: Schedule and manage several projects at the same time
shorts reasons item 3: Send reviews and final projects through the client gateway
shorts reasons title: Why you should use Kitsu for your Short Movie production
shorts subtitle: Trailers, Ads, Docs, Music Clips, Youtube
software-integrations header explanation: Your data flows throughout your entire pipeline. That's why we provide integrations to facilitate communication between your tools. We enable your artists to publish from their tools, allow your team to send notifications to your chat applications, and offer API clients for extending your workflow.
software-integrations header metrics: 10 solutions are already integrated with Kitsu!
spreadsheets explanation one: We understand that you are accustomed to spreadsheets and that transitioning to a new tool can be challenging. Even if you are not ready to use Kitsu, we want to assist you. That's why we've prepared production-ready spreadsheets for you. You can use them as a starting point to build your workflow or keep them throughout your production. Everything is free and licensed under Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 2.0. Enjoy!
spreadsheets tagline: Build your workflow with our spreadsheets
studio-database api content: Building a movie involves a lot of data: assets, shots, casting, task assignments, file locations, and more. All this information must be shared among all departments. The Kitsu API provides central storage for all this data, which can be queried from anywhere.
studio-database api title: Share your data with the entire studio
studio-database boost content: Store your production data in a single place. Synchronize your data, publish previews directly from your tools, and run custom scripts when events occur. Every action can be automated.
studio-database header explanation: Kitsu exposes an HTTP API that allows you to centralize and access all your data. Your tools connect to it and query the data from your production, enhancing the artists' tools and helping them focus on the artistic side of their work.
studio-database header metrics: More than 100,000 API calls are made to the Kitsu API every day!
studio-database python content: Take advantage of intuitive functions to fetch production data. It also offers a raw client to handle more complex requests. An integrated cache system ensures faster response times. The entire package is available on PyPi.org.
studios explanation one: Discover the studios using Kitsu and view the productions they have completed.
studios subtitle: Kitsu is used all over the world
tailor-made-architecture extra content: Take the next step by implementing the most advanced cloud technologies on your private servers: object storage, video computing clusters, and monitoring tools. We can set up everything for you and your Kitsu installations.
tailor-made-architecture extra subtitle: AD Connection, Local Object Storage, Local Video Cluster
tailor-made-architecture header explanat: As your studio grows, you may have specific requirements: on-premise installation, Active Directory integration, multi-instances, local object storage, and local video computing clusters. At CGWire, we can configure these customizations on your dedicated hardware. Our operations team will set up the perfect installation for your studio.
tailor-made-architecture header subtitle: We adapt our setup to meet your studio's needs.
tailor-made-architecture multiinstance c: As a large studio, you may need to keep teams and production data separated from other projects for security and organizational reasons. That's why we offer isolated installations for each production. This way, you can have different pipelines without interfering with other setups.
tailor-made-architecture onpremise conte: We can set up Kitsu with all the advantages of the cloud directly on your servers. You can feel secure and benefit from close-proximity servers while enjoying all our services (security, uptime, and performance). Your installation is kept up to date and monitored as if it were in our cloud. Additionally, it can be integrated with your Active Directory.
team-collaboration header explanation: Kitsu enhances communication among all stakeholders, simplifying collaboration across different sites and for remote work. Artists know their tasks and can deliver movies and images directly to the Director. Supervisors and Producers stay informed and can easily give instructions.
team-collaboration header metrics: More than 5,000,000 comments have already been posted on Kitsu!
team-collaboration news content: Thanks to the news feed, you will never miss any comments or new previews. Everyone in the studio stays informed about ongoing activities, making it easier to anticipate problems.
team-collaboration tasks content: Assign tasks to artists, who can publish their work in Kitsu for review once completed. Producers, Supervisors, and Directors can iterate directly through the platform. Thanks to our real-time engine, everyone is instantly notified when a change occurs.
team-collaboration todos content: Your artists know what is expected of them and can share their progress. This keeps everyone on the same page at all times, allowing artists to be more autonomous and focus more on the their art.
team-collaboration todos title: Keep everyone on the same page
team-collaboration usecase one: Your artists know what is expected of them and can share their progress. This keeps everyone on the same page at all times and facilitates feedback. Finally, because Kitsu includes the Kitsu API, you can integrate your pipeline and enjoy improved and synchronized software.
team-collaboration usecase title: Keep everyone on the same page
team-collaboration why one: Major production management applications are costly and hard to set up. With Kitsu, we aim to provide a lightweight solution that is suitable for multi-site studios. You won't need to pay for a consultant, as you can learn it by yourself in a matter of minutes!
top-notch-support chat content: Our support is easily accessible, whether in-app, via Discord, or Zoom. We are always available to assist you with Kitsu.
top-notch-support chat title: Access to our team when you need
top-notch-support experts content: Our support team consists of production veterans who understand the challenges you face because they've experienced them too. We ensure you utilize Kitsu's full potential and can even collaborate with you to add new features to the software.
top-notch-support fast content: On average we respond in 30 minutes. We are always very reactive and eager to answer your questions whether you are looking for a specific Kitsu menu, or want to discuss workflows.
top-notch-support header explanation: Benefit from the industry's fastest response time via in-app chat. All discussions are saved and can be supplemented with a ticketing system. Most importantly, you talk with production experts, not chatbots.
top-notch-support header subtitle: We are always here to help you
try cgwire docker: Try the CGWire suite with Docker
tvshows people desc 1-1: Artists need quick access to their tasks and a simple way to communicate about their work by posting comments and previews.
tvshows people desc 1-2: When artists log in, they land on their to-do list. At a glance, they see what tasks they need to complete.
tvshows people desc 1-3: All tasks are properly detailed: due date, estimation, priority level, current status, and the latest comment.
tvshows people desc 1-4: With a single click, artists can open a comment panel without leaving their to-do list. It's very fast to respond or send a new preview. Through the notification system (in-app, email, or Slack), they know when something happens.
tvshows people desc 2-1: Directors have an efficient way to review pending tasks and stay aware of what's happening in production. This allows them to react quickly and avoid the team wasting time due to incorrect directions.
tvshows people desc 2-2: Kitsu provides a playlist system: the Director can review multiple shots consecutively, whether pending reviews or the entire movie. Kitsu includes editing functions such as changing the shot order or switching versions on the fly, allowing the Director to be more precise about what they want to see.
tvshows people desc 3-1: As a Production Manager, you need to track production costs and know what has been reviewed and how many retakes have occurred.
tvshows people desc 3-2: Kitsu provides efficient timesheets where you can see the number of hours spent by each artist per day, week, or month for all productions.
tvshows people desc 3-3: For each shot or asset, you can see the overall time spent on it. This helps identify entities that are too costly. You can set estimates for each task and compare them to the actual time spent.
tvshows people desc 3-4: The statistics page allows you to write your producer report faster. You don’t have to chase down information. It shows you the production's progress in real-time.
tvshows people desc 3-5: You don't need to spend time gathering files for daily or weekly reviews. With the playlist page, you can set up reviews quickly and ensure nothing is missed.
tvshows people desc 4-1: The producer has a comprehensive view of the production. They can verify any information from the client or the contractor.
tvshows people desc 4-2: Kitsu allows the producer to see the financial status of the production, including where money is spent and why. They can identify the most costly shots or assets. Thanks to the charts, they always know how the production is progressing.
tvshows people desc 4-3: The producer doesn't depend on others to see the progress of the show. No one has to stop working to provide updates. The producer can independently view the progress of a sequence in real-time.
tvshows people desc 5-1: Supervisors need instant access to information at all times. They don't want to search for the right spreadsheet or file to comment on.
tvshows people desc 5-2: Fortunately, with Kitsu, everything is in one place. Supervisors don't have to wait for others to know what to do. They always know what to review and which retakes need to be done.
tvshows people desc 5-3: Task assignments, mentions, and comments ensure that information is always sent to the right person efficiently. Ultimately, supervisors have everything at hand to make and share the right decisions.
tvshows quote: When you work on a 52x11’ series, you have to deal with an insane amount of deliveries. Fortunately, with Kitsu, everything was running smoothly.
tvshows quote author: Cécile Hergaux, Head of Studio at Cube Creative
tvshows reasons item 1: Get an overview of the progress of all your episodes
tvshows reasons item 2: Run full episode reviews through a single playlist with external collaborators
tvshows reasons item 3: Keep track of retake numbers and build report easily
tvshows reasons title: Why you should use Kitsu for your TV Series production
